mapper.select: select style_board.*, user_table.username, user_table.img, user_table.introMsg, product_table.productName, product_table.img1 from style_board left join user_table on style_board.userId = user_table.userid left join product_table on style_board.productId = product_table.productid order by style_board.likeCount desc, style_board.replycount desc, style_board.styleId desc
select * from style_board left join user_table on style_board.userId = user_table.userid left join product_table on style_board.productId = product_table.productid order by style_board.styleId desc

select * from (select * from style_board left join user_table on style_board.userId = user_table.userid left join product_table on style_board.productId = product_table.productid order by style_board.styleId desc) total_table where total_table.username = #{username}

select * from style_board left join user_table on style_board.userId = user_table.userid left join product_table on style_board.productId = product_table.productid where style_board.styleId = #{styleId}
select * from style_board where userId=#{userId} order by regdate desc
select count(*) from style_board where userId=#{userId}
mapper.update: update style_board set likecount = likecount+1 where styleId=#{styleId}
mapper.delete: delete from style_like where userId=#{userId} and styleId=#{styleId})
mapper.update: update style_board set likecount = likecount-1 where styleId=#{styleId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from style_reply where styleId=#{styleId}
select userId from user_table where username=#{username}
select price from (select rownum rn, total.* from (select * from sales_table where productId=#{productId} and status=0 order by price asc)total) where rn=1

select style_reply.stylereplyid, user_table.img, user_table.username, style_reply.contents, style_reply.regDate from style_reply left join user_table on style_reply.userId = user_table.userId where style_reply.styleId = #{styleId} order by style_reply.stylereplyid desc

select.if: select count(*) from style_board where reportCount >= 5

mapper.select: select count(*) from style_board where ${searchOption} like '%' || #{inputWord} || '%'
